sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.ChangeManagementLUAUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Track the usage analytics data for Changes created by REST API </description>
        <name>ChangeManagementLUAUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ChangeManagementLUAUtil = Class.create();
ChangeManagementLUAUtil.prototype = {

    ORIGIN_TYPE_REST_CHANGE_API: 'REST Change API',
    ORIGIN_TYPE_REST_TABLE_API: 'REST Table API',

    STREAM_ID_CHANGE_REQUEST: "sn.change_request",

    EVENT_TYPE_CREATE: 'create',

    initialize: function() {},

    sendChangeRequestRESTCreateAnalytics: function(transaction, userSysID) {

        var origin = this._getOrigin(transaction);

        if (!origin)
            return;

        var data = {};
        data["user.sys_id"] = userSysID;
        data["origin"] = origin;

        this._sendAnalytics(this.STREAM_ID_CHANGE_REQUEST, this.EVENT_TYPE_CREATE, [], data);

    },

    _sendAnalytics: function(streamID, eventType, obfuscationList, dataObj) {

        if (sn_uapaf.ScopedAnalyticsFramework.isDisabled() || sn_uapaf.ScopedAnalyticsFramework.isBlocked(streamID)) {
            gs.info(this.type + ": Analytics Framework is disabled or Blocked");
            return;
        }

        if (!streamID || !eventType)
            return;

        dataObj["event.type"] = eventType;

        var status = sn_uapaf.ScopedAnalyticsFramework.open(streamID);

        if (status === 0) {
            status = sn_uapaf.ScopedAnalyticsFramework.sendJSON(streamID, obfuscationList, JSON.stringify(dataObj));
            if (status !== 0)
                gs.warn('Unable to send analytics for stream:' + streamID + '; status = ' + status);

            sn_uapaf.ScopedAnalyticsFramework.close(streamID);
        } else
            gs.warn('Unable to open Usage Analytics for  stream ' + streamID + '; status = ' + status);

    },

    _getOrigin: function(transaction) {

        var requestURL = '' + transaction.getURL();

        if (!requestURL)
            return '';
        else if (requestURL === '/api/now/table/change_request')
            return this.ORIGIN_TYPE_REST_TABLE_API;
        else if (requestURL.startsWith('/api/sn_chg_rest/'))
            return this.ORIGIN_TYPE_REST_CHANGE_API;
        else
            return '';

    },

    type: 'ChangeManagementLUAUtil'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-07-24 18:29:58</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>67b25a9ab7763300a2828644de11a9c9</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>69</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ChangeManagementLUAUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Change Management - Core" source="com.snc.change_management">a39309476da620100acb70b35343307a</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>protected</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_67b25a9ab7763300a2828644de11a9c9</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-08-14 10:23:17</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>2087</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
